query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `permissions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `roleId` int NOT NULL,
  `resource` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `action` enum('create', 'read', 'update', 'delete', 'export', 'approve') NOT NULL,
  `scope` enum('own', 'organization', 'all') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'own',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `role_idx` (`roleId`),
  INDEX `resource_idx` (`resource`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_role_resource_action` (`roleId`, `resource`, `action`)
)
command:

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `roleId` int NOT NULL,
  `resource` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `action` enum('create', 'read', 'update', 'delete', 'export', 'approve') NOT NULL,
  `scope` enum('own', 'organization', 'all') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'own',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `role_idx` (`roleId`),
  INDEX `resource_idx` (`resource`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_role_resource_action` (`roleId`, `resource`, `action`)
)
